text: Murray Waxman (born July 10, 1925 in Toronto, Ontario) is a retired Canadian basketball player who competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was part of the Canadian basketball team, which finished eighth in the Olympic tournament. ==Other websites== * Murray Waxman at basketball-reference.com Category:1925 births Category:1948 Summer Olympics Category:Canadian basketball players Category:Olympians for Canada Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:2022 deaths
title: Murray Waxman
